short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a card counter to each list in Trello without access to board data

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sometimes the new sprint contains too many tasks, and it becomes difficult to track the workload and progress in real time. This extension adds card and story point counters (with Agile Tools power-up) to each list in Trello.

Features:
• Card counter
• Story point counter
(appears only on lists that contain story points)
• Without access to account data
• Instant refresh
• Imitates Trello UI
